We securely encrypt your financial information.

Add your favourite bank accounts and cards so you can pay, get paid back and send money to friends while you\'re on the go.\n\nWe help keep your financial details secure so no one sees your sensitive information.

Use your PayPal balance to pay online and with the PayPal Cash Card. You can also create a goal and set money aside.

Add a Bank Account or Card
How much do you want to transfer?
PayPal works with or without a balance
When you have a balance, you can use it when you pay. When you don\'t, pay more securely using your preferred bank account or card.
Add money to your balance for free by using Direct Debit, transferring from your bank or depositing cash in shops.
Leave the money in your balance to use when you send money or buy something.Or withdraw it to your bank account.
Use your PayPal balance to shop online, pay with the PayPal Cash Card, get cash at ATMs and send money to family and friends.
Add money to your balance to bring it above zero
We don\'t charge penalty fees for this, but you won\'t be able to send money or make purchases until you\'ve added money.

This rate includes our currency conversion fee.

To transfer your balance to a bank account, you\'ll need to link one to your PayPal account.

For security reasons we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update.

What do you want to do with your money?
Withdraw it to your bank account
Move your money to your debit card in minutes or to your bank account in about a day.
Send or spend it more securely from your balance.Use it as fun money or save it for a rainy day.
To keep your money in PayPal, we need a bit more information
Confirming customers\' identities is one of the best ways we help keep your account secure.You\'ll generally only have to do this once.
Create a PayPal balance with a quick, one-time confirmation
We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve finished reviewing your documents.This usually takes 2-3 working days.
We\'re still reviewing your information. We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve finished.
Your money is now available in your PayPal balance. Send it, spend it, or just keep it as your stash of fun money.
For now, you can withdraw your money to your bank account.
It looks like something went wrong on our end.
Until you confirm your information, you won\'t be able to send or spend money in your PayPal account.
While you\'re waiting, you can always withdraw the money to your bank account.
Confirm your info now so you can send or spend the money in your PayPal account. If not, you can always transfer the money to your bank account from your Summary.
Then you can easily send, spend or save your unclaimed money and any other money you may receive.
If you want to send money right now, try using a linked bank or card.
We\'ll use this when you shop online or send money for goods and services. \n%1$s
We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve finished reviewing your information.This usually takes 2-3 working days.
Bring your cash to a participating store and show the cashier your barcode. The money will be added to your PayPal balance in just 15 minutes.
It looks like something went wrong at our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your payment is pending while we review it.
If you\'ve made any payments that haven\'t been completed yet, we\'ll charge those to your card even after you\'ve removed it.
It looks like something went wrong at our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
When it comes to paying, you have options. Check out your preferences below.
When it\'s time to pay or get paid, you\'ve got options. Check out your preferences below.
When you send money to friends and family, we\'ll default to your balance or bank account to save you a fee.
When sending to friends and family, we\'ll use your bank account if we can save you a fee.
Pick a new preferred way to pay
Make it your preferred way to pay.
We keep your financial details secure so no one sees your sensitive information. %%1$s
It looks like there\'s an issue with your funding source. It might be unconfirmed or expired. Find out more in the Bank Accounts and Cards section.
This is your preferred way to pay. If you have any outstanding purchases, they will be completed even if it\'s removed.

By tapping \"Agree,\" you agree to let PayPal send 2 small deposits and retrieve them in 1 withdrawal.

This %%1$s bank account may be used as your default payment method. To learn how to change your preferences, view PayPal policies and your payment method rights.
If you don\'t have enough money in your balance, we\'ll ask you to pick one of your other funding sources.
Every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it straight to your bank account.
It’s the 9-digit number at the lower left corner of your cheques. No cheques? Log in to your online banking account and you can find it there.
How to find a sort code
It’s the 3-17 digit number on your checks or bank statements. Or log in to your online banking account and you can find it there too.
How to find an account number
Check your online banking in a few days for 2 small deposits, then come back to the app and enter them.
Now you can withdraw money from your PayPal balance to this bank account. Confirm it and use your bank account to pay or send money.
Now you can withdraw money from your PayPal balance to this bank account.
It looks like something went wrong at our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
Check again in a couple of days.
If you need help, contact us. Or you can link and confirm a different bank.
Enter the amounts of the 2 deposits we\'ve made to your %1$s(%1$s) account
By tapping Link This Bank, you consent to an identity and credit check.
You can add a bank account that\'s registered in one of the following countries:
Select the country of your bank account.
Please enter your date of birth
You must be at least 18 years old.
The IBAN should be %1$s-%1$s characters long

Thanks for providing your %%1$s details. You can now transfer money from PayPal to your bank account.\n\nPlease accept the direct debit mandate below if you’d also like us to automatically pull payments from your bank when you make PayPal purchases.

We need your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) to identify and process payments better. You can find your IBAN on your bank statement, in your online banking account or by contacting your bank.
Check your bank in a few days for the confirmation code we\'ve sent, then come back and enter the code.

By tapping Accept you agree to the SEPA Direct Debit Instruction and authorise PayPal to send instructions to your bank account. You also authorise your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from PayPal. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks, starting from the date on which your account was debited.
To buy online or send money, you must accept the Direct Debit Instruction.

Payments will appear as PAYPAL on your bank statement. A copy of your Direct Debit Instruction will be emailed to you.

If your bank account requires more than one person\'s signature to authorise a Direct Debit Instruction, please select Finish Later and go to paypal.com to print the instructions and post us a signed copy.
Enter the code we\'ve sent you below, so we can confirm your bank account has been set up properly with PayPal.

We\'ve sent a confirmation code to your bank.Log in to your online banking account or call your bank to get the code. To make sure you\'ve received it, we\'ll send the code each time you make a transaction until you\'ve confirmed your bank account.

By tapping \"Agree,\" you agree to let PayPal send 2 small deposits and retrieve them in 1 withdrawal.

This bank account may be used as your default payment method. To learn how to change your preferences, view PayPal policies and your payment method rights.
Your sort code is a 5-digit number located on your bank statement.
Institution is a 3-digit number located on your bank statement.
Unable to fetch the code automatically\nyou can enter it manually.
Add a bank account or card
Link a new bank account or card
The code will now be submitted automatically.
If there\'s an issue with your preferred payment method, we\'ll try the remaining payment methods linked to your PayPal account. View PayPal policies.

We will share your account information with %%1$s in order to facilitate the services you request, keep your account updated, and help manage risk and fraud.\n\nBy tapping \"Agree and Link,\" you agree to Paypal\'s terms and conditions for linking your card
Make sure your PIN is hard to guess.
The PIN you\'ve entered doesn\'t match.
Avoid using easy to guess PINs like 1234 or 5555.
To manage Chase Pay, look for the link on the card details screen.
Can\'t see all of your cards?
You can always add one manually.
Here are your card details provided by %1$s. Now, choose which cards to add to your PayPal account.
By tapping \"Next\", you agree to PayPal\'s Terms and Conditions for adding your card
You’ll no longer be able to use your %%1$s for eligible purchases. Pending payments with %%2$s will still be processed even after you decide to stop using your %%3$s with PayPal.
We\'ll share your information with %1$s to help provide the services you\'ve requested, display available card features and keep your account updated.
Are you sure you don\'t want to add any cards?
Check the security code and try again.
Are you sure you want to exit? Not all of your cards have been added.
We\'re sorry, we seem to have hit a snag.
You can always add a card manually instead.
The next time you check out with PayPal, you can use your available %1$s for eligible purchases.
The next time you check out with PayPal, you can use your available %1$s for a statement credit.
Don’t want to remove %%1$s entirely? You can hide a card anytime by updating your %%3$s settings.
We\'re sorry, we seem to have hit a snag.Please try again later.
You can always add a card manually instead.
Use your %1$s %1$s for a statement credit on eligible purchases when you shop online.
Never worry about an expired card or outdated information. Your cards will stay updated automatically.
We can\'t remove your %1$s at the moment. Please try again later.
Refresh to check out your %1$s balance
When you remove %1$s, you\'ll no longer see any of the cards you\'ve added with %1$s. You can always manually add these cards instead.
We\'re sorry, we\'re not able to remove %1$s at the moment. Please try again later.
Every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it straight to your bank account.
Turn it on, and every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it straight to your bank account.
It looks like you\'ve selected a bank account or card that has been removed.Choose another bank account or card.
Your debit card has expired. Please choose another bank account or debit card.
For your security, we\'ve turned off automatic transfers. Choose another debit card or bank account to turn it back on.
Now, whenever you receive money, we\'ll withdraw all of it to your %1$s.You can always turn this off in your Settings.
There\'s an issue with your bank account or debit card
Please choose a different bank account or card to turn automatic transfers on.
We\'ve had to turn off automatic transfers for the moment. You can still transfer money to your bank account.
Make your transfers automatic. No need to log in.Go to your Settings to turn this on.
We\'re sorry, we\'re not able to set up automatic transfers for you at the moment. You can try again the next time you transfer money to your bank account.Or try turning them on in your Settings.
It looks like something went wrong at our end.
Choose a different bank account or card
You\'ve withdrawn %1$s to your bank account using your %1$s.
To help keep your account secure, we\'ll take a closer look at this transfer. The review could take up to %1$s hours.
You can help speed up the review process by confirming your identity.
We\'ll review your photo and ID. If we\'re able to confirm your identity, we may release your funds sooner.
You\'ll get a notification with an update in the next 5 minutes.
Looks like we had some trouble getting a good photo of you. Don\'t worry. We\'ll manually review your %1$s transfer, and your funds will be released within %2$s hours.
It looks like you share this card with someone else. We\'ll text that person before adding the card to your account.
PayPal: %1$s wants to link your %2$s ••%3$s to PayPal. For security, we won\'t do anything until you respond. Text YES to approve, NO to decline.
You\'ll see a notification in PayPal once the other account holder responds, and we\'ll show the card in your account if it\'s approved.
You\'ll see a notification in PayPal once the other account holder responds, and we\'ll show the card in your account if it\'s approved.
We\'re sorry, we seem to have hit a snag.
